#summary How to use the page function.

= Page function =

The new Page function is for retrieving sites from other automatically.<br/><br/>

Every Client can start this function for the other.<br/>
With /page file you can retrieve a site from another.<br/>
With /mypage file you can send a site to another.<br/><br/>

When there are no file in the command, it is automatically index.<br/>
For set your own page you must set page in the settings on and create a <br/>file with the name index.txt or another file with the end .txt in page/ 
Now your client sent automatically this text to all the other when the command come in.
